item.title: 欧佩克+再次推迟放宽供应限制计划，石油价格下跌
item.description: 在欧佩克+将逐步恢复停产的时间再推迟三个月后，石油交易量变化不大。【原文：Oil traded little changed after OPEC+ delayed the incremental revival of shuttered production by another three months.】

item.title: 迈阿密海滩枫丹白露酒店在债券市场借款 9.75 亿美元
item.description: 迈阿密海滩豪华酒店枫丹白露出售了价值 9.75 亿美元的商业抵押担保证券，用于债务再融资。【原文：Luxury hotel Fontainebleau Miami Beach sold a $975 million commercial mortgage-backed security to refinance debt.】

item.title: 香港试管婴儿规则让人们进入卵子和胚胎黑市
item.description:
随着城市出生率的下降，生育援助的局限性正在造成压力。【原文：

As the city contends with a falling birth rate, the limits of reproductive assistance are causing strains.

】

item.title: 日本央行态度鹰派，廉价日元对日本股市的提振作用降至零
item.description: 长期以来，日元疲软对日本股市有利的说法可能最终会被打破，因为在全球货币政策出现分歧的情况下，日元与日本股市的相关性加速瓦解。【原文：The long-held precept that a weak yen is a good thing for Japanese stocks may finally be put to rest, as the breakdown in their correlation accelerates amid divergence in global monetary policy.】

item.title: 马斯克的 xAI 公司完成最新一轮 60 亿美元融资
item.description: 根据一份监管文件，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 xAI 已筹集到 60 亿美元的新资金，结束了酝酿数月之久的一轮融资，据说该人工智能初创公司的估值超过 400 亿美元。【原文：Elon Musk’s xAI has raised $6 billion in new capital, according to a regulatory filing, wrapping up a funding round that has been in the works for months and was said to value the artificial intelligence startup at more than $40 billion.】

item.title: 就业数据公布前，亚洲股市将追随美国股市跌势：市场综述
item.description: 周五，在就业数据有助于决定美联储是否会在 12 月降息之前，美国股市五个交易日以来首次下跌，亚洲股市也随之下跌。【原文：Asian equities were primed for declines Friday after US stocks fell for the first time in five sessions ahead of jobs data that will help determine whether the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates in December.】

item.title: 淡水河谷贱金属公司管理层裁员数十人
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，淡水河谷公司（Vale SA）的贱金属子公司将解雇数十名管理人员，以简化公司结构，提高业绩。【原文：Vale SA’s base metals subsidiary will let go of dozens of managers to simplify its corporate structure and improve performance, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 私人信贷期待在并购浪潮中扩大规模
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 和 Blue Owl Capital Inc. 的高管表示，随着交易平均规模的扩大以及并购大门的打开，私人信用贷款机构明年的重点将是实现规模化。【原文：For private credit lenders, a focus next year will be on achieving scale, as the average size of transactions swell and the gates open for mergers and acquisitions, according to Blackstone Inc. and Blue Owl Capital Inc. executives.】

item.title: 谁是今年黄金狂飙的幕后推手？
item.description:
在这部彭博原创迷你纪录片中，我们将揭开闪亮金属屡创新高的神秘面纱，以及它对未来的意义。【原文：

In this Bloomberg Originals mini-documentary, we pull the curtain back on why that shiny metal keeps hitting record highs, and what it means for the future.

】

item.title: 联邦通信委员会以新规则回应中国对电信公司的攻击
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会周四提出了一套规则，要求电信运营商采取措施保护其网络免受网络安全威胁，因为有消息称，中国黑客很可能已在美国通信基础设施中潜伏数月之久，而且还没有结束的迹象。【原文：The US Federal Communications Commission proposed a set of rules Thursday that mandates carriers take steps to protect their networks against cybersecurity threats in the wake of revelations that Chinese hackers have likely been embedded in US communications infrastructure for months — with no end in sight.】

item.title: Aviva 接近与 Direct Line 达成初步协议
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Aviva Plc 即将达成收购 Direct Line Insurance Group Plc 的初步协议。【原文：Aviva Plc is nearing a preliminary agreement to acquire Direct Line Insurance Group Plc, as the UK motor insurer finally succumbs to a suitor after fending off takeover interest since early this year, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 白爪生产商寻求增加现金，考虑重组
item.description: 据知情人士透露，生产 White Claw 和 Pabst Blue Ribbon 等酒精饮料的 City Brewing Co.【原文：City Brewing Co., which makes alcoholic drinks such as White Claw and Pabst Blue Ribbon, is seeking a new loan to boost cash while it explores a potential restructuring that could include a bankruptcy filing, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 将人类垃圾转化为药物的探索
item.description:
在早期试验取得成功后，MaaT Pharma 公司即将成为首家获准生产用于癌症治疗的微生物相关产品的公司。【原文：

After success in early stage trials, MaaT Pharma is on the verge of becoming the first company to have an approved microbiome-related product for cancer care.

】

item.title: 艾睿咨询在重组交易中接管法国收债公司
item.description: 英国资产管理公司 Arrow Global 准备接管 iQera 集团，作为经过数月谈判后与大多数债权人达成的债务重组协议的一部分。【原文：UK asset manager Arrow Global is poised to take over iQera Group as part of a debt overhaul agreed upon with the majority of its creditors after months of negotiations.】

item.title: 简街公司与千禧年公司就印度期权商业机密案达成和解
item.description: 简街集团（Jane Street Group）和千禧年管理公司（Millennium Management）同意就两名前交易员涉嫌窃取价值十亿美元的印度期权交易秘密策略的法律纠纷达成和解。【原文：Jane Street Group and Millennium Management agreed to settle a legal dispute over two former traders’ alleged theft of a secret billion-dollar India options trading strategy.】

item.title: 科技公司首席执行官称打造更好的人工智能系统越来越难
item.description:
这些评论是在有关人工智能是否正在遭遇技术壁垒的辩论之后发表的。【原文：

The comments follow a renewed debate over whether AI is hitting a scaling wall. 

】

item.title: 垃圾债券专家认为明年利差将有所扩大
item.description: 华尔街一些顶级垃圾债券策略师表示，2025 年将是美国高收益公司债券利差收窄趋势开始转向的时候。【原文：Some of Wall Street’s top junk-bond strategists say 2025 is when the trend toward tighter spreads on high-yield US corporate bonds begins to turn.】

item.title: 人工智能和服务器推动 HPE 销售额强劲增长
item.description: 惠普企业公司（Hewlett Packard Enterprise Co.【原文：Hewlett Packard Enterprise Co. reported better-than-expected quarterly revenue and a jump in sales of servers to power artificial intelligence work.】

item.title: 摩根大通偏爱房地产、私募股权而非直接借贷
item.description: 摩根大通资产管理公司（JPMorgan Asset Management）认为，私人信贷可能在投资者中风靡一时，但还有更好的选择。【原文：Private credit may be all the rage among investors, but there are better alternatives, according to JPMorgan Asset Management.】

item.title: Palantir 与 Shield AI 合作开发人工智能驱动的自动驾驶飞机
item.description: 国防科技公司帕兰提尔科技公司（Palantir Technologies Inc.【原文：Defense tech companies Palantir Technologies Inc. and Shield AI have signed an agreement for a new strategic partnership, a step toward developing autonomous flight with AI-powered intelligence and operational control.】

item.title: 萨默斯抨击美国国家比特币储备计划 "疯狂
item.description: 美国前财政部长劳伦斯-萨默斯（Lawrence Summers）否定了政府建立比特币资产储备的想法，并警告说，按照亿万富翁、当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的盟友埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的计划缩减联邦支出将面临政治挑战。【原文：Former US Treasury Secretary Lawrence Summers dismissed the idea of the government setting up a reserve of Bitcoin assets, and cautioned about the political challenge ahead in scaling down federal spending in the way billionaire and President-elect Donald Trump ally Elon Musk plans.】

item.title: 雪佛龙和壳牌权衡在阿根廷石油出口计划中的股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp. ）和壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）正在商谈加入阿根廷的标志性项目，以增加其蓬勃发展的页岩区的原油出口。【原文：Chevron Corp. and Shell Plc are in talks to join Argentina’s signature project to ramp up crude exports from its booming shale patch, according to people familiar the matter.】

item.title: 嘀嗒音乐负责人谈 2024 年大趋势及其与 UMG 的关系
item.description:
在今年的榜单中，泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）和加快速度的混音作品明显缺席

。【原文：

Taylor Swift and sped-up remixes were notably absent from the top of this year’s lists

】

item.title: 施瓦布的琼斯担心信贷市场的定价会让人感到自满
item.description: 美国高等级公司债券利差徘徊在 25 年多来最窄的水平附近，明年可能会更低。嘉信理财公司（Charles Schwab Corp.【原文：High-grade US corporate bond spreads hover near their tightest levels in more than 25 years and may grind even lower next year. Charles Schwab Corp.’s Kathy Jones sees cause for concern.】

item.title: 科瓦利斯资本向泰晤士水务提出 50 亿英镑的收购要约
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，基础设施投资者科瓦利斯资本公司（Covalis Capital）已提交了一份50亿英镑（64亿美元）的收购申请，希望收购陷入困境的英国泰晤士水务公司（Thames Water）。【原文：Infrastructure investor Covalis Capital has submitted a £5 billion ($6.4 billion) bid to take over struggling UK water company Thames Water, according to a person familiar with the matter, as the beleaguered utility races to raise new funding before it runs out of cash.】

item.title: EQT 委托 FT Partners 出售支付公司 Banking Circle
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，EQT AB 正与精品投资银行 Financial Technology Partners 合作，为支付服务提供商 Banking Circle 寻找买家。【原文：EQT AB is working with boutique investment bank Financial Technology Partners to find buyers for payments-services provider Banking Circle, which could fetch $3 billion to $4 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 咆哮的凯蒂猫发布《时代》杂志 "你 "封面的帖子，掀起了一场备忘录集会
item.description: 基思-吉尔（Keith Gill）在 X 下午发布了一个隐晦的帖子，之后美国股市的动物精神汹涌而至，他在网络上被称为 "咆哮的小猫"（Roaring Kitty），在 2021 年的meme股票狂潮中一举成名。【原文：Animal spirits in the US equity market rampaged into a handful of meme stocks after a cryptic afternoon X post from Keith Gill, the online persona known as Roaring Kitty who rose to fame in 2021’s meme-stock mania.】

item.title: 预计未来五年美国电力需求将激增 16
item.description: 据一份新报告称，受新数据中心和工厂耗电的影响，未来五年美国的电力需求将激增近 16%，是一年前估计值的三倍多。【原文：US demand for electricity will surge almost 16% over the next five years, more than triple the estimate from a year ago, driven by new data centers and factories that are going to suck up power, according to a new report.】

item.title: 比特币期权显示交易者已在创纪录涨至 10 万美元后进行对冲
item.description: 期权表明，在比特币首次飙升至 10 万美元以上后，一些交易者可能已经开始对冲比特币可能出现的回调。【原文：Options suggest that some traders may have already started to hedge against a potential pullback in Bitcoin after the original cryptocurrency surged to more than $100,000 for the first time.】

item.title: 戴尔为马斯克的孟菲斯超级计算机部署数万颗人工智能芯片
item.description: 戴尔科技公司已经部署了数万个图形处理单元，为埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）在孟菲斯的超级计算机项目的人工智能工作提供动力。【原文：Dell Technologies Inc. has deployed tens of thousands of graphics processing units to power artificial intelligence work at Elon Musk’s supercomputer project in Memphis.】
